Introduction
This topic contains general information on the marriage dates requirement, including
importance of the marriage dates requirement
marriage dates requirement stipulations
when the marriage dates requirement is a consideration
, and
definition of a child born of the marriage
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Establishing Marital Relationship in Survivors Cases
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D
